ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: Dracona comes up next to Plintissa. So, where does the Ark need repairing? Dracona asked. I shall help as well, this base would be better with it s shell.

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Dracona comes up next to Plintissa.

"So, where does the Ark need repairing?" Dracona asked.

"I shall help as well, this base would be better with it's shell." Artist
said. Plintissa gasped and looked at him. Artist looked at her strangely.

"You rhymed." Plintissa whispered.

"I did not, preposterous!" Artist said. Dracona pondered to herself and
recorded this in her computer book. Stranato walked up.

"You need my help, it would take an eternity if you bots tried to do it
without me." Stranato said. Dracona growled at him. Stranato held up 3
fingers and walked with the rest. Train Wreck and Airbomber sighed and
followed as well...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 24, 2000 7:13 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG


> ::Prowl/Striker::
>
> An thrill runs through Prowl's spine as Iron Raptor puts her arm around
him,
> reminding him of how he held her in her quarters only a short time ago.
His
> hands slide to her back as as she puts her head on his shoulder, clearing
the
> thought of the battle or of damage totaly from his mind as he felt her
> against him. He nods as he hears her speak, the vibrations sending an
> exciting feeling up his spine.
>
> "All right," he says, his breath speeding up as she strokes his neck.
> Whatever he was about to add was forgotten as she quickly kisses him,
walking
> off toward Plintissa.
>
> He follows her, his eyes glued to her body as she moves toward Plintissa.
He
> walks up to her as Plintissa and Dracona do, and puts an arm around her
> waist, pressing her to him. He growls silently as he hears the sound of
shots
> followed by an avalance outside.
>
> "I'll go see what's up," he says, kissing Iron Raptor, reluctantly letting
go
> of her, and walking off toward the exit of the Ark, his hand on his gun
just
> in case.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker walks out of the CR chamber, recieving Bronko's transmission. He
> curses under his breath, sending a comm to Iron Raptor.
>
> "A bot has just sent a transmission that requires your attention," he says
> into his comm-link, walking off toward the bridge,
>
